info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:59AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Berks County through 330 AM EDT... At 259 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harper Tavern, or near Annville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bernville and Strausstown. This includes Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 8, and between mile markers 10 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
